text: André Dufraisse (30 June 1926 – 21 February 2021) was a French cyclo-cross racer from 1950 to 1964. He was born in Razès, France. Dufraisse won the World Cyclo-cross Championships five times from 1954 to 1958, and was cyclo-cross champion of France seven times between 1955 and 1963. Dufraisse died on 21 February 2021, aged 94.Quintuple champion du monde de cyclo-cross, André Dufraisse est mort Le Limousin André Dufraisse, quintuple champion du monde de cyclo-cross, est décédé ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2021 deaths Category:French cyclists Category:People from Haute-Vienne Category:Sportspeople from Nouvelle-Aquitaine
title: André Dufraisse
